memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_model *model, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, struct net_buf_simple *msg, const struct bt_mesh_send_cb *cb, void *cb_data)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_model_send

briefdescription.para: Send an Access Layer message.

parameterdescription.para: Mesh (client) Model that the message belongs to.
Message context, includes keys, TTL, etc.
Access Layer payload (the actual message to be sent).
User data to be passed to the callback.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Send a model publication message.

detaileddescription.para: Before calling this function, the user needs to ensure that the model publication message (bt_mesh_model_pub::msg) contains a valid message to be sent. Note that this API is only to be used for non-period publishing. For periodic publishing the app only needs to make sure that bt_mesh_model_pub::msg contains a valid message whenever the bt_mesh_model_pub::update callback is called.

parameterdescription.para: Mesh (client) Model that's publishing the message.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Check if a message is being retransmitted.

detaileddescription.para: Meant to be used inside the bt_mesh_model_pub::update callback.

simplesect.para: true if this is a retransmission, false if this is a first publication.

briefdescription.para: Get the element that a model belongs to.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the element that the given model belongs to.

briefdescription.para: Find a SIG model.

parameterdescription.para: Element to search for the model in.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the Mesh model matching the given parameters, or NULL if no SIG model with the given ID exists in the given element.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct bt_mesh_elem *elem, uint16_t company, uint16_t id)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_model_find_vnd

briefdescription.para: Find a vendor model.

parameterdescription.para: Element to search for the model in.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the Mesh model matching the given parameters, or NULL if no vendor model with the given ID exists in the given element.

briefdescription.para: Get whether the model is in the primary element of the device.

simplesect.para: true if the model is on the primary element, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_model *mod, bool vnd, const char *name, const void *data, size_t data_len)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_model_data_store

briefdescription.para: Immediately store the model's user data in persistent storage.

parameterdescription.para: Name/key of the settings item. Only SETTINGS_MAX_DIR_DEPTH bytes will be used at most.
Model data to store, or NULL to delete any model data.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or (negative) error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Let a model extend another.

detaileddescription.para: Mesh models may be extended to reuse their functionality, forming a more complex model. A Mesh model may extend any number of models, in any element. The extensions may also be nested, ie a model that extends another may itself be extended.
A set of models that extend each other form a model extension list.

All models in an extension list share one subscription list per element. The access layer will utilize the combined subscription list of all models in an extension list and element, giving the models extended subscription list capacity.

parameterdescription.para: Mesh model that is extending the base model.

briefdescription.para: Check if model is extended by another model.

parameterdescription.para: If model is extended by another model, otherwise false

detaileddescription.para: Maximum size of an access message segment (in octets).
Maximum payload size of an unsegmented access message (in octets).
Maximum number of segments supported for incoming messages.
Maximum number of segments supported for outgoing messages.
Maximum possible payload size of an outgoing access message (in octets).
Maximum possible payload size of an incoming access message (in octets).
Helper to define a mesh element within an array.
In case the element has no SIG or Vendor models the helper macro BT_MESH_MODEL_NONE can be given instead.
Macro for encoding exact message length for fixed-length messages.
Macro for encoding minimum message length for variable-length messages.
End of the opcode list. Must always be present.
Helper to define an empty opcode list.
Helper to define an empty model array

briefdescription.para: Composition data SIG model entry with callback functions.

parameterdescription.para: Callback structure, or NULL to keep no callbacks.

briefdescription.para: Composition data vendor model entry with callback functions.

parameterdescription.para: Callback structure, or NULL to keep no callbacks.

briefdescription.para: Composition data SIG model entry.
Composition data vendor model entry.
Encode transmission count & interval steps.

parameterdescription.para: Number of retransmissions (first transmission is excluded).
Interval steps in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0, less than or equal to 320, and a multiple of 10.

simplesect.para: Mesh transmit value that can be used e.g. for the default values of the configuration model data.

briefdescription.para: Decode transmit count from a transmit value.
Decode transmit interval from a transmit value.
Encode Publish Retransmit count & interval steps.

parameterdescription.para: Number of retransmissions (first transmission is excluded).
Interval steps in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0 and a multiple of 50.

simplesect.para: Mesh transmit value that can be used e.g. for the default values of the configuration model data.

briefdescription.para: Decode Publish Retransmit count from a given value.

parameterdescription.para: Encoded Publish Retransmit count & interval value.

briefdescription.para: Decode Publish Retransmit interval from a given value.

parameterdescription.para: Encoded Publish Retransmit count & interval value.

briefdescription.para: Get total number of messages within one publication interval including initial publication.
Get message number within one publication interval.

detaileddescription.para: Meant to be used inside bt_mesh_model_pub::update.
Define a model publication context.

parameterdescription.para: Variable name given to the context.
Optional message update callback (may be NULL).

detaileddescription.para: Special TTL value to request using configured default TTL
Maximum allowed TTL value

briefdescription.para: Access layer.
